content: Hi! This is the virtual assistant for XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you today? Are you looking for help with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services?
Hey there! I need some help with my HVAC system, but honestly, I’m really busy this month and can’t schedule anything right now.
No problem at all! I completely understand. If you find some time later or your schedule opens up, feel free to message us anytime. We’re always here to help with your HVAC needs. Have a great month!
reason: Customer too busy to schedule at this time
